response.overview: A young French martial arts expert who was born and raised in America to Mexican parents has to go to a "very illegal and underground tournament" in China that everyone knows about, in order to avenge the honor of his not dead master.
response.tagline: A young French martial arts expert who was born and raised in America to Mexican parents has to go to a "very illegal and underground tournament" in China that everyone knows about, in order to avenge the honor of his not dead master.
response.title: Martial Science
